overview: Aira, a witty young woman decides to find her fiancee, Darwish who suddenly cancels their wedding for no reason. Aira travels to Wales where Darwish works, but her presence is not welcomed by him. In a cafe, their quarrel catches public attention especially Jaka the dishwasher. With Jaka's help Aira plans to win back Darwish from his new girlfriend, Marissa. Many funny incidents happen during the mission.
title: Autumn in Wales
